description:
If left untouched for three days, Duke Cannon's beard would grow a beard. Therefore, he needs a shaving product that will clean him up without the burn. His barbershop formula shaving cream is engineered with only Superior Grade ingredients:
- Aloe Vera for relief
- Shea Butter for hydration
- Macadamia Nut Oil for the closest possible shave
- Calendula Extract for recovery.
Duke Cannon Superior Grade Shaving Cream is for men of higher taste, not for clowns
title: Duke Cannon Superior Grade Shave Cream - 6oz

bullets: Meets barbershop standards for a clean, effortless shave.
Made in the USA and a portion of proceeds benefits US Veterans.
6 oz. tube.

description: Dove Men+Care understands how wet shaving can strip away your skin's natural moisture. Our Hydrate+ Pro-Moisture Shave Cream is clinically proven to provide superior moisturization, leaving skin feeling soft and smooth before, during and after shaving. Dove Men+Care Hydrate+ Pro-Moisture Shave Cream has a moisture-rich formula which provides hydration to the skin and softens stubble on contact for a close shave. The moisture rich ingredients also help reduce pulling on the skin to protect against nicks and cuts. The result: a better shave and a smooth skin feel even hours after shaving. For a clean shaven look, our Hydrate+ Pro-Moisture Shave Cream is one of the best shaving creams for men. Why choose Hydrate+ Pro-Moisture Shave Cream? It provides superior hydration. Our shaving cream's unique formula provides advanced protection for dry skin. It helps provide a better shave experience. The low foaming shave cream applies easily without mess, and allows for better precision. It helps to reduce irritation. Our hydrating shave cream helps your razor glide across your skin and reduces the risk of irritation. Try other face products from Dove Men+Care: Hydrate+ Face Wash and Hydrate+ Face Lotion
title: Dove Men+Care Shave Cream Hydrate Plus Pro Moisture 5 oz
